docs.text: Selamat Datang Selamat datang di Dokumentasi API V.1 Kementerian Agama. Postman Silahkan download file Postman disini , untuk melakukan testing. Buka Postman API Client. Jika belum ada, silahkan download Postman API Client . file > import - Import file postman yang didownload. Example PHP - CURL <?php $curl = curl_init(); curl_setopt_array($curl, array( CURLOPT_URL => 'https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/auth/login', CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true, CURLOPT_ENCODING => '', CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST', CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => array('email' => 'youremail','password' => 'yourpassword'), CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array( 'Cookie: cookiesession1=xxxxxx' ), )); $response = curl_exec($curl); curl_close($curl); echo $response; Nodejs - Axios var axios = require('axios'); var FormData = require('form-data'); var data = new FormData(); data.append('email', 'youremail'); data.append('password', 'yourpassword'); var config = { method: 'post', url: 'https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/auth/login', headers: { 'Cookie': 'cookiesession1=xxxxxxx', ...data.getHeaders() }, data : data }; axios(config) .then(function (response) { console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data)); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); });
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Selamat datang di Dokumentasi API V.1 Kementerian Agama.
docs.title: Selamat Datang

docs.text: Silahkan download file Postman disini , untuk melakukan testing. Buka Postman API Client. Jika belum ada, silahkan download Postman API Client . file > import - Import file postman yang didownload.
docs.title: Postman

docs.text: <?php $curl = curl_init(); curl_setopt_array($curl, array( CURLOPT_URL => 'https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/auth/login', CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true, CURLOPT_ENCODING => '', CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST', CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => array('email' => 'youremail','password' => 'yourpassword'), CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array( 'Cookie: cookiesession1=xxxxxx' ), )); $response = curl_exec($curl); curl_close($curl); echo $response;
docs.title: PHP - CURL

docs.text: var axios = require('axios'); var FormData = require('form-data'); var data = new FormData(); data.append('email', 'youremail'); data.append('password', 'yourpassword'); var config = { method: 'post', url: 'https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/auth/login', headers: { 'Cookie': 'cookiesession1=xxxxxxx', ...data.getHeaders() }, data : data }; axios(config) .then(function (response) { console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data)); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); });
docs.title: Nodejs - Axios

docs.text: API Authentication API Kemenag menggunakan Json Web Tokens ( JWT ) sebagai autentikasi pengguna. Gunakan access_token dari respon untuk mengambil data pegawai dan lainnya. GET Token POST /v1/auth/login HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Content-Length: 38 email=your_email&password=your_password Response { "message": "User authenticated successfully", "user": { "email": "your_email" }, "access_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJuaXAiOiIxOTg3MDcyMjIwMTkwMzEwMDUiLCJpYXQiOjE2MTI5Njk5MjQsImV4cCI6MTYxMjk3MzUyNH0.reanp54xbHiVXWrbLZEuAMrKva-gLdoKupRajhDy6Wc" }
docs.title: Authentication

docs.text: API Kemenag menggunakan Json Web Tokens ( JWT ) sebagai autentikasi pengguna. Gunakan access_token dari respon untuk mengambil data pegawai dan lainnya.
docs.title: API Authentication

docs.text: POST /v1/auth/login HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Content-Length: 38 email=your_email&password=your_password

docs.text: { "message": "User authenticated successfully", "user": { "email": "your_email" }, "access_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJuaXAiOiIxOTg3MDcyMjIwMTkwMzEwMDUiLCJpYXQiOjE2MTI5Njk5MjQsImV4cCI6MTYxMjk3MzUyNH0.reanp54xbHiVXWrbLZEuAMrKva-gLdoKupRajhDy6Wc" }
docs.title: Response

docs.text: Data Pegawai Kementerian Agama Important Setiap pengambilan data, wajib menggunakan Authorization Bearer Token Get All Pegawai Lorem markdownum amantes solane. Sua Graias tua filia quarta. Fabricator naides in lacrimis raptaque rogus: tenaci sanguine erat, sensurum tum aconiton haut; deum digiti, agitant. Minoris ligno somnusque, ostendisse mutatur luctus nota, ambiguis facto spes vereri. GET /v1/pegawai HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Get Filter Pegawai POST /v1/pegawai HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Parameter satker : Kode Unit Kerja Atasan limit : Limit start : Mulai Pencarian Here's some example code: return shell_exec("echo $input | $markdown_script"); Respon { "title": "Data Pegawai dalam Satuan Kerja", "total": 594, "size": 44, "start": 550, "limit": 50, "data": [ { "NIP": "1502xxxx", "NIP_BARU": "1955xxxxxx", "NAMA": "IMAMxxxxx", "NAMA_LENGKAP": "Dr. H. IMAMxxxx", "AGAMA": "Islam", "TEMPAT_LAHIR": "Purbaxxxx", "TANGGAL_LAHIR": "1955xxxxx", "JENIS_KELAMIN": 1, "PENDIDIKAN": "S3 Studi Islam Pasca Sarjana Tahun 2011", "KODE_LEVEL_JABATAN": "202", "PANGKAT": "Pembina Utama Muda", "GOL_RUANG": "IV/c", "TMT_SK": "2000-04-01xxx", "MASAKERJA_TAHUN": 19, "MASAKERJA_BULAN": 1, "TIPE_JABATAN": "Jabatan Fungsional Tertentu", "KODE_JABATAN": "20203", "TAMPIL_JABATAN": "Lektor Kepala", "TMT_JABATAN": "2015-10-29 00:00:00", "KODE_SATKER_1": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_1": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_2": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_2": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_3": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_3": "Pascasarjana", "KODE_SATKER_4": "04400xxxxxx", "SATKER_4": "IAIN Pekalongan", "KODE_SATKER_5": "04000xxxxxx", "SATKER_5": "Institut Agama Islam Negeri (IAIN)", "SATUAN_KERJA": "Program Studi Magistexxxxxx", "STATUS_KAWIN": "Kawin", "ALAMAT_1": "Jl. KH. A.Dahlanxxxx", "ALAMAT_2": "Tirto", "TELEPON": "0285xxxx", "KAB_KOTA": "Kota xxxx", "PROVINSI": "Jawa xxxx", "KODE_POS": "51xxx", "KODE_LOKASI": "", "KODE_PANGKAT": "43" } ....... } Get Single Pegawai Mengambil data single pegawai bisa menggunakan method GET dengan parameter NIP . Misal https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/pegawai/profil/198000000 GET /v1/pegawai/profil/[nip] HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Respon { "status": true, "code": 200, "title": "Profil Pegawai", "data": { "NIP": "", "NIP_BARU": "", "NAMA": "", "NAMA_LENGKAP": "", "AGAMA": "", "TEMPAT_LAHIR": "", "TANGGAL_LAHIR": "", "JENIS_KELAMIN": , "PENDIDIKAN": "", "KODE_LEVEL_JABATAN": "", "LEVEL_JABATAN": "", "PANGKAT": "", "GOL_RUANG": "", "TMT_CPNS": "", "TMT_PANGKAT": "", "MASAKERJA_TAHUN": , "MASAKERJA_BULAN": , "TIPE_JABATAN": "", "KODE_JABATAN": "", "TAMPIL_JABATAN": "", "TMT_JABATAN": "", "KODE_SATKER_1": "11070000000000", "SATKER_1": "UIN Sunan Ampel Surabaya", "KODE_SATKER_2": "11070000000000", "SATKER_2": "UIN Sunan Ampel Surabaya", "KODE_SATKER_3": "11070000000000", "SATKER_3": "UIN Sunan Ampel Surabaya", "KODE_SATKER_4": "11070000000000", "SATKER_4": "UIN Sunan Ampel Surabaya", "KODE_SATKER_5": "11000000000000", "SATKER_5": "Universitas Islam Negeri (UIN)", "SATUAN_KERJA": "UIN Sunan Ampel Surabaya", "STATUS_KAWIN": "Kawin", "ALAMAT_1": "", "ALAMAT_2": "", "TELEPON": "", "KAB_KOTA": "", "PROVINSI": "", "KODE_POS": "", "KODE_LOKASI": "", "KODE_PANGKAT": "" } } Get Pedidikan Pegawai Data pendidikan pegawai diambil tersendiri sesuai pengambilan berdasarkan NIP. Misal https://api.kemenag.go.id/v1/pegawai/pendidikan/198000000 GET /v1/pegawai/pendidikan/[nip] HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Respon { "status": true, "code": 200, "title": "Pendidikan Pegawai", "data": [ { "NO_URUT": 1, "NIP": "230004496", "NAMA_SEKOLAH": "", "FAKULTAS_PENDIDIKAN": "", "JURUSAN": "Teknik Informatika", "TAHUN_LULUS": "2013", "JENJANG_PENDIDIKAN": "S2", "LOKASI_SEKOLAH": "", "AKTA": "" } ] } Get Pekerjaan Pegawai Data pekerjaan pegawai diambil tersendiri sesuai pengambilan berdasarkan NIP. docs.text: Master Data Simpeg Data Satuan Kerja Berisi data satuan kerja seluruh Indonesia. GET /v1/master/satker HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Data Jabatan Berisi data Jabatan Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/jabatan HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Data Level Jabatan Berisi data Level Jabatan Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/level_jabatan HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Data Pangkat Berisi data Pangkat Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/pangkat HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
docs.title: Master Data

docs.text: Berisi data satuan kerja seluruh Indonesia. GET /v1/master/satker HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
docs.title: Data Satuan Kerja

docs.text: Berisi data Jabatan Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/jabatan HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
docs.title: Data Jabatan

docs.text: Berisi data Level Jabatan Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/level_jabatan HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
docs.title: Data Level Jabatan

docs.text: Berisi data Pangkat Kementerian Agama. GET /v1/master/pangkat HTTP/1.1 Host: https://api.kemenag.go.id Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Bearer eyJ0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
docs.title: Data Pangkat

docs.text: Single Sign On 1. Registrasi Aplikasi Silahkan masuk ke halaman console api.kemenag.go.id dan buat aplikasi. Anda akan mendapatkan APP Id yang digunakan sebagai identifikasi aplikasi Anda. 2. Setting Client Berisi data Jabatan Kementerian Agama. 1. Redirect ke SSO Pastikan jika tidak ada session yang sudah terdaftar, alihkan ke halaman login SSO. https://sso.kemenag.go.id?appid=[appid] 2. Respon SSO SSO akan mengalihkan halaman/redirect ke URL Callback yang sudah didaftarkan dengan mengirimkan parameter token yang sudah digenerate. https://aplikasi.kemenag.go.id?token=[token] 3. Verifikasi Token GET /auth/verify HTTP/1.1 Host: sso.kemenag.go.id Authorization: Bearer <bearer token> PHP - CURL <?php $curl = curl_init(); curl_setopt_array($curl, array( CURLOPT_URL => 'https://sso.kemenag.go.id/auth/verify', CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true, CURLOPT_ENCODING => '', CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET', CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array( 'Authorization: Bearer <Token>' ), )); $response = curl_exec($curl); curl_close($curl); echo $response; 4. Handle Respon SSO akan memberikan data pegawai yang login. Silahkan gunakan untuk dikonsumsi. Bisa menggunakan session atau apapun. { "NIP": "1955xxxxxx", "NIP_LAMA": "1502xxxx", "NAMA": "Dr. H. IMAMxxxx", "KODE_LEVEL_JABATAN": "202", "KODE_JABATAN": "", "JABATAN": "", "FULL_JABATAN": "", "PANGKAT": "Pembina Utama Muda", "GOLONGAN": "IV/c", "ROLE": "Jabatan Fungsional Tertentu", "SSO_ROLE": "", //role yang terdaftar pada API "KODE_SATKER_1": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_1": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_2": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_2": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_3": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_3": "Pascasarjana", "KODE_SATKER_4": "04400xxxxxx", "SATKER_4": "IAIN Pekalongan", "KODE_SATKER_5": "04000xxxxxx", "SATKER_5": "Institut Agama Islam Negeri (IAIN)", "NO_HP": "", "EMAIL": "", } Contoh Full Code (PHP - Codeigniter) <?php class Auth extends CI_Controller{ const SSO_URL = 'https://sso.kemenag.go.id/auth'; const SSO_SIGNIN = self::SSO_URL.'/signin'; const SSO_SIGNOUT = self::SSO_URL.'/signout'; const SSO_VERIFY = self::SSO_URL.'/verify'; const APP_ID = 'ID aplikasi yang terdaftar'; function index() { if (!$this->session->userdata('nip')) { redirect(self::SSO_SIGNIN.'?appid='.self::APP_ID); }else{ redirect('user/absen'); } } public function callback() { $token = $this->input->get('token') ?? ''; if($token){ $verify_url = self::SSO_VERIFY; $ch = curl_init($verify_url); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST'); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, ['Accept: application/json', 'Authorization: Bearer '. $token]); $response = curl_exec($ch); if (curl_errno($ch)) { echo "CURL ERROR: ".curl_error($ch); curl_close($ch); exit(); } curl_close($ch); $ret = json_decode($response, true); if($ret['status'] == 200) { $pegawai = $ret['pegawai']; $session_data = array( 'nip_lama' => $pegawai['NIP_LAMA'], 'nip' => $pegawai['NIP'], 'jabatan' => $pegawai['KETERANGAN_JABATAN'], 'nama' => $pegawai['NAMA'], 'photo' => $pegawai['PHOTO'], 'sso_role' => $pegawai['SSO_ROLE'], 'satker1' => $pegawai['KODE_SATUAN_KERJA'], 'satker2' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_2'], 'satker3' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_3'], 'satker4' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_4'], 'satker5' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_5'], 'type' => 'user', ); $this->session->set_userdata($session_data); //jika valid //redirect('wellcomepage'); }else{ //jika tidak valid //redirect('auth'); } } else { die('Something Wrong'); } } public function logout() { $this->session->sess_destroy(); redirect($this->SSO_SIGNOUT); } public function is_loggedin($value='') { if($this->session->userdata('nip')) { return true; } return false; } }
docs.title: Single Sign On

docs.text: Silahkan masuk ke halaman console api.kemenag.go.id dan buat aplikasi. Anda akan mendapatkan APP Id yang digunakan sebagai identifikasi aplikasi Anda.
docs.title: 1. Registrasi Aplikasi

docs.text: Berisi data Jabatan Kementerian Agama.
docs.title: 2. Setting Client

docs.text: Pastikan jika tidak ada session yang sudah terdaftar, alihkan ke halaman login SSO. https://sso.kemenag.go.id?appid=[appid]
docs.title: 1. Redirect ke SSO

docs.text: SSO akan mengalihkan halaman/redirect ke URL Callback yang sudah didaftarkan dengan mengirimkan parameter token yang sudah digenerate. https://aplikasi.kemenag.go.id?token=[token]
docs.title: 2. Respon SSO

docs.text: GET /auth/verify HTTP/1.1 Host: sso.kemenag.go.id Authorization: Bearer <bearer token> PHP - CURL <?php $curl = curl_init(); curl_setopt_array($curl, array( CURLOPT_URL => 'https://sso.kemenag.go.id/auth/verify', CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true, CURLOPT_ENCODING => '', CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true, CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET', CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array( 'Authorization: Bearer <Token>' ), )); $response = curl_exec($curl); curl_close($curl); echo $response;
docs.title: 3. Verifikasi Token

docs.text: SSO akan memberikan data pegawai yang login. Silahkan gunakan untuk dikonsumsi. Bisa menggunakan session atau apapun. { "NIP": "1955xxxxxx", "NIP_LAMA": "1502xxxx", "NAMA": "Dr. H. IMAMxxxx", "KODE_LEVEL_JABATAN": "202", "KODE_JABATAN": "", "JABATAN": "", "FULL_JABATAN": "", "PANGKAT": "Pembina Utama Muda", "GOLONGAN": "IV/c", "ROLE": "Jabatan Fungsional Tertentu", "SSO_ROLE": "", //role yang terdaftar pada API "KODE_SATKER_1": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_1": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_2": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_2": "Program Studi Magister Pendidikan Agama Islam", "KODE_SATKER_3": "04401xxxxx", "SATKER_3": "Pascasarjana", "KODE_SATKER_4": "04400xxxxxx", "SATKER_4": "IAIN Pekalongan", "KODE_SATKER_5": "04000xxxxxx", "SATKER_5": "Institut Agama Islam Negeri (IAIN)", "NO_HP": "", "EMAIL": "", }
docs.title: 4. Handle Respon

docs.text: <?php class Auth extends CI_Controller{ const SSO_URL = 'https://sso.kemenag.go.id/auth'; const SSO_SIGNIN = self::SSO_URL.'/signin'; const SSO_SIGNOUT = self::SSO_URL.'/signout'; const SSO_VERIFY = self::SSO_URL.'/verify'; const APP_ID = 'ID aplikasi yang terdaftar'; function index() { if (!$this->session->userdata('nip')) { redirect(self::SSO_SIGNIN.'?appid='.self::APP_ID); }else{ redirect('user/absen'); } } public function callback() { $token = $this->input->get('token') ?? ''; if($token){ $verify_url = self::SSO_VERIFY; $ch = curl_init($verify_url); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST'); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, ['Accept: application/json', 'Authorization: Bearer '. $token]); $response = curl_exec($ch); if (curl_errno($ch)) { echo "CURL ERROR: ".curl_error($ch); curl_close($ch); exit(); } curl_close($ch); $ret = json_decode($response, true); if($ret['status'] == 200) { $pegawai = $ret['pegawai']; $session_data = array( 'nip_lama' => $pegawai['NIP_LAMA'], 'nip' => $pegawai['NIP'], 'jabatan' => $pegawai['KETERANGAN_JABATAN'], 'nama' => $pegawai['NAMA'], 'photo' => $pegawai['PHOTO'], 'sso_role' => $pegawai['SSO_ROLE'], 'satker1' => $pegawai['KODE_SATUAN_KERJA'], 'satker2' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_2'], 'satker3' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_3'], 'satker4' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_4'], 'satker5' => $pegawai['KODE_SATKER_5'], 'type' => 'user', ); $this->session->set_userdata($session_data); //jika valid //redirect('wellcomepage'); }else{ //jika tidak valid //redirect('auth'); } } else { die('Something Wrong'); } } public function logout() { $this->session->sess_destroy(); redirect($this->SSO_SIGNOUT); } public function is_loggedin($value='') { if($this->session->userdata('nip')) { return true; } return false; } }
